patthana12.8:1.1_0: Naappaccayaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkhataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana12.8:2.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana12.8:3.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ,
patthana12.8:3.1_1: adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana12.8:4.1_0: Narūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naarūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana12.8:4.1_1: adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana12.8:5.1_0: Nalokiyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nalokuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca,
patthana12.8:6.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava.)
